description: Creates a cache subnet group. For more information about cache subnet groups, go to Cache Subnet Groups in the *Amazon ElastiCache User Guide* or go to [CreateCacheSubnetGroup](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonElastiCache/latest/APIReference/API_CreateCacheSubnetGroup.html) in the *Amazon ElastiCache API Reference Guide* .

CacheSubnetGroupName.description:
The name for the cache subnet group. This value is stored as a lowercase string.

Constraints: Must contain no more than 255 alphanumeric characters or hyphens.

Example: `mysubnetgroup`

Description.description: The description for the cache subnet group.

SubnetIds.description: The EC2 subnet IDs for the cache subnet group.

Tags.description: A tag that can be added to an ElastiCache subnet group. Tags are composed of a Key/Value pair. You can use tags to categorize and track all your subnet groups. A tag with a null Value is permitted.
